General.Name: Zona Franca de Iquique S.A
General.Description: Zona Franca de Iquique S.A. operates premises for wholesale and retail business centers in the duty-free zones of South America. It offers required infrastructure for companies to store, commercialize, and distribute their products in the markets. The company's on premises services include food gardens, toilets, cleaning, security, street lighting, paved avenues and streets, sewage and drinking water systems, telephone networks, and online services, as well as high, medium, and low voltage lines, as well as people and vehicle access control system. It also operates logistics centers. The company is based in Iquique, Chile.
